briefTitle: An Observational Study of Herceptin SC Safety in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Herceptin Subcutaneous in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Safety (composite outcome measure): Incidence of adverse events (AEs), serious adverse events (SAEs), adverse events of special interest, pregnancies, adverse drug reactions (ADRs); unexpected ADRs; expected ADRs
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

- All patients administered Herceptin SC for the locally approved indications

Exclusion Criteria:

N/A
